name: Iliad
headline: Create images and 3D models with ease and artistic control.
description:
Iliad is a creative tool for generating images and 3D models.

Iliad can make characters, environments, avatars, game icons, designs, backgrounds, textures, and materials.

Right now, it's free for up to 50 images and 5 3D models per day.

The transform setting gives you fully continuous, granular control over your generations, so you can color sketch out what you want and guide your visual ideas into refined images. It's the best image-to-image interface.

It's easy to create detailed 3D meshes and voxel art from your images using the 3D pipeline.

founders.name: Matthew Turnshek, Founder
founders.description: Matthew Turnshek is the founder and CEO of Iliad.

generated_description:
**Iliad: Unleashing Creative Possibilities in Image and 3D Model Creation**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Iliad is all about making creativity accessible. Based in Pittsburgh, PA, this innovative startup has a straightforward mission: to empower users to create stunning images and 3D models effortlessly, all while maintaining artistic control. 

### What does Iliad do?

Iliad started as a tool for generating images and 3D models but has rapidly expanded its capabilities. Users can create characters, environments, avatars, game icons, designs, backgrounds, textures, and materials. The platform currently offers a generous pricing model—it's free for generating up to 50 images and 5 3D models per day. This is a perfect entry point for hobbyists and indie developers looking to enhance their projects without breaking the bank.

One of Iliad’s standout features is its transform setting, which provides granular control over the creative process. By allowing users to start with a color sketch or an existing image, they can fine-tune their visual ideas into polished outputs. It’s lauded as one of the best image-to-image interfaces available.

Moreover, the 3D pipeline enables users to transform 2D images into detailed 3D meshes and voxel art in no time. Whether you’re looking to synthesize seamless textures for 3D materials or create stunning backgrounds, Iliad makes it simple and intuitive.

### Key Features:
- **User-Friendly Interface:** Designed for intuitive navigation, making it fun to use.
- **Energy and Control:** Gain precise control over your image generations with the transform setting.
- **Texture Creation:** Easily create unique, tiled textures for various applications.
- **Community and Support:** Users can connect, share work, and give feedback through Iliad’s Discord community.

### User Praise
Early adopters have expressed enthusiasm about Iliad's impact on their projects. Comments such as "Iliad genuinely feels handmade and artisanal" and "This AI is game-changing for aspiring game developers!" highlight the platform’s utility and creativity enhancement.

### Next Steps
If you’re curious about diving into the world of generative AI art, check out Iliad at [iliad.ai](https://iliad.ai). It might just become an essential tool in your creative arsenal. So why not give it a try? Your next artistic breakthrough could be just a sketch away!
